Statute.Title: Canada — Costa Rica Free Trade Agreement Implementation Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Accord de libre-échange Canada — Costa Rica, Loi de mise en oeuvre de l’)

Minister.Text: Minister for International Trade as Minister for the purposes of sections 1 to 8 and Parts 1 and 3 (SI/2002‑147)

CIF.Text: CIF, 2002, c. 22, s. 411 in force on assent 13.06.2002
